Title: Prohibits the use of drilling fluids and flowback water from wells, pools or fields on any highway
Summary: Prohibits the use of drilling fluids and flowback water from wells, pools or fields on any highway for any purpose including but not limited to de-icing or dust suppression.
LawCode: Amd ยง23-0305, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the use of drilling fluids and flowback water from wells, pools or fields on any highway
